title: Drop-Off
description: Please try to avoid dropping off in the Visitor Parking Lot at the back of UHS. It's best to drop off at the side of the school facing Shaw.

title: Boys Volleyball
description: Good luck to our Boys Volleyball team as they play for the championship on March 14th, 2023 at Duncan Polytechnical High School. For any questions or well wishes, please see Mr. Hagen!

title: Girls Volleyball
description: Good luck to our Girls Volleyball team as they play for the championship on March 16th, 2023 at Duncan Polytechnical High School. For any questions or well wishes, please see Mr. Hagen!

title: DA Smittcamp Presentation
description: On March 17th, we will be having a special presentation at the Resnick Student Union, presented by a DA from Smittcamp. Students are required to attend this assembly. Please check Remind for the full special assembly schedule.

title: Pantages Trip
description: On Saturday, March 18th, UHS will be taking a trip down to Universal Citywalk in LA to watch the Lion King at the Pantages Theater. Tickets have been sold and students are to pick up their permission slips from Mr. Benslay sometime this week. If you have any questions, please contact Mr. Benslay. Have fun!
